summary: A collection of lightweight Django management command implementations used exclusively in the test suite for admin scripts. It includes a reusable base command class handling argument parsing and execution, a command that processes an app's configuration, an extended startproject command with extra options, a utility command for label manipulation, and a simple command that runs without arguments and can be invoked programmatically.
business_intent: Provide mock and helper management commands that emulate real admin‑script behavior, allowing automated tests to verify command‑line interactions, configuration handling, and utility functions without relying on the full production command set.
